#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int n, sum, i, t ;

	vector<int> A( 10001 );
	sum = 0;
	for( i = 0;i <= 10000;i++ ) {
		sum += (int)floor( static_cast<double>(i) / 2.0 );
		A[ i ] = sum;
	}

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &n );
		printf("%d\n", A[ n ] );
	}

	return 0;

}
